author: marioevz
content:
With the EOF devnet just around the corner I wanted to revive this PR: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/783

Basically with this change we can produce state tests from every `eof_test` by using a single contract deploy transaction and the test container wrapped in an init-container.

The nice thing is that now all `eof_test` would be compatible with `uv run execute` that <@808969530608451584> has been using to crash the past two devnets, so we can run all EOF tests in this mode and wait for the catastrophe ðŸ˜„

We have 96 tests that fail in state test mode, and it's basically tests that use large containers, and when wrapped in an initcontainer, it's simply not possible to send the transaction. It should be an easy fix to mark these to skip the state test mode altogether, or maybe some other workaround.
